questions.question: Why does the old wolf grow a small garden?

choices.answer: he was too slow to snatch birds
he was too stiff to chase rabbits
he enjoyed growing a garden every year
he loves to eat vegetables from a garden

questions.question: True or false? In the old wolfs garden, there were so many weeds he could not find his garden.

choices.answer: True
False

questions.question: What did the wolf find when he climbed up the mountain?

choices.answer: a boy with goats
nothing
vegetables
his friends

questions.question: Why did the old wolf follow the voice he heard on the mountain?

choices.answer: they were his friends
they were his enemies
he wanted to deliver food from his garden
he thought whoever it was, may have have food to share

questions.question: Why did the elders come running up the hill to the young boy?

choices.answer: the thought the young boy had seen a wolf
they were excercising
they saw a wolf
yelling that a wolf was coming to steal all the goats

listening to stories the old wolf was telling him

questions.question: What was the little boy doing in the story?
Why didn't the wolf eat the goat?

choices.answer: He was not hungry anymore.
The goat ate all the weeds.

questions.question: How did the wolf change from the beginning to the end of the story?

choices.answer: He ate the goat.
He made a friend with the little boy.
He made a friend with the goat.

questions.question: How do you think the wolf will treat the goat?

choices.answer: He will eat the goat later.

He will be nice and care for the goat.
